title: Must Read: 14 American Designers Launch 'The Collective', Burberry to Cut 20% of Global Workforce
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Wednesday. This spring, 14 American designers are joining forces to launch "The Collective," a pop-up experience at the Hindman Gallery on the Upper East Side. "The Collective" pop-up will run from May 18-20 at 32 East 67th St. "The Collective" ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
